name: Game Master Manager
description:
Play and feel like you are the Game Master of this game, build, maintenance & improve your game server to become rich!

How to Play

-> You can click the Monitor to see the whole battle and press esc to quit
-> You can see the upgrade menu & full view of the status by clicking the tablet below
-> You can buy the server to get more money
-> Be careful with the cheater, so you need to upgrade your Security System (Coming in the next Update XD)
-> Watch the server health so your server never explode (Coming in next update to
-> Engage your player so they will stay longer (also coming in the next update)
-> Your goal is to gain 1 M Player or 1 M Money (this one too so yeah :D)
